title: Ep 284 | Jase's IRS Violation, Airline Power Grabs, and Should You Invest in Ungodly Companies?
description:
Phil baptizes several generations of a family from Oregon in one day. Jase's mailbox is flooded by letters from the IRS saying he owes an absurd amount of money. Jase and Al are fed up with power grabs in the "friendly" skies, and Phil isn't seeing much of the golden rule on airplanes. Jase talks about how to handle investing in companies that aren't godly. And the guys dive into the faith of Abraham and biblical parallels in Phil's relationship with his daughter, Phyllis.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
